message: Let me know if you are interested, I developed the site solo.  I am looking for a partner who can redesign it and shares the vision.
how much equity are you willing to give up?
A fair amount, make me an offer we can both live with.
I like the idea! contact[a]kaish.in if you are interested.

Just a small pointer:  most people can nag themselves for free (Paper, leaving a message on their answering machine).  I sure would not pay for this kind of service.  You may have better luck with gaining revenue through ads.  I would have the person submit their nag and then be forced to view a 30 second nag.  If the site becomes popular you may want to switch to a pay model.  Also nagnation sounds clunky

It's an interesting concept but it  seems like you're asking people to pay for an inherently unpleasant experience.  When I'm thinking of what to cut back on, I'd imagine the person I pay to annoy me would be at the top of the list.  Might just be crazy enough to work!
